meanings.definition: A dish of meat, vegetables, etc., cooked in an Indian-style sauce of strong spices and turmeric.
meanings.sent1: I love the smell of curry wafting from the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a spicy chicken curry for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The curry was so hot, it made her eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of curry filled the room, transporting me to India.
meanings.sent5: The colorful curry looked like a work of art on the plate.

meanings.definition: To prepare or flavor with a sauce or seasoning containing curry.
meanings.sent1: She will curry the chicken before grilling it.
meanings.sent2: He likes to curry his dishes with a blend of spices.
meanings.sent3: Currying the meat with care resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The chef curried the stew to perfection, enhancing its flavor.
meanings.sent5: Currying the sauce with precision made all the difference in the dish.
